title: #61: How jobs-to-be-done (JTBD) nearly killed our startup | Troy Sultan and Austin Cooley (Guide.co)

rawLines.text: What's up everybody? Welcome to another
episode of Super Insider. This episode's
a really fun one. We had two of my

company guide and how getting to feature
